Section.about_paragraph_1: As a front-end developer, I design interfaces that are both attractive and high-performing.
Section.about_paragraph_2: I enjoy transforming complex ideas into fluid experiences through a creative approach.
Section.about_paragraph_3: What motivates me is bringing projects with a tangible impact to life. Combining technical rigor with a sense of design.

blockfire.title: Block'Fire
blockfire.subtitle: E-commerce Website
blockfire.about_paragraph_1: Block'Fire is a company that offers an innovative fire safety product: an automatic fire-extinguishing ball that activates on impact or upon contact with fire, providing easy and effective protection for homes, vehicles, and businesses.
